author: akarasulu
msg: There is no need to have the additional codec package component but more
importantly by combining some code under o.a.d.s.asn1.codec with code
under o.a.d.s.ans1 it removed several package interdependencies.
Once codec is fully collapsed out of the picture it will hopefully be
much clearer. We all know we're dealing with a codec and there's no
need for the extra layer of indirection since in java package nesting
has no scoping associated with it.
